definition: new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)

sentences.english: And the different number of tillers had the most effect on rice yield.
sentences.chinese: 且不同莖櫱苗對產量的影響最大。

sentences.english: Both the number of reproductive vegetative tillers and tillers were dominant at the maturity stage, but at the flowering stage.
sentences.chinese: 其營養櫱數與生殖櫱數在籽實成熟期高於開花期。

sentences.english: Both the number of reproductive vegetative tillers and tillers were dominant at the maturity stage, but at the flowering stage.
sentences.chinese: 其營養櫱數與生殖櫱數在籽實成熟期高於開花期。

sentences.english: Middle-aged indivedual is of strong ability of generation and gradually produce new one from mother individual.
sentences.chinese: 中齡植株根櫱性很強，能從母株不斷生長新株。

sentences.english: The effects of different fertilization treatments on total tiller number were very obvious.
sentences.chinese: 不同施肥處理對總莖櫱數的影響非常明顯。

sentences.english: Tillers are a great tool to take advantage of.
sentences.chinese: 櫱是一個偉大的工具，利用。

sentences.english: The adventitious roots breaks out profusely on the 4 year old stocks grown from suckers.
sentences.chinese: 根櫱苗不定根在4年生以後大量發生。

sentences.english: The suckering of seabuckthorn is related to the growth vigor of slocks and the root ripeness.
sentences.chinese: 沙棘根櫱與植株生長勢及根系成熟程度有關。

sentences.english: Heteropappus altaicus is a root sucker type perennial herbaceous clonal plant of compositae.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾泰狗哇花爲根櫱型菊科多年生無性系草本植物。

definition: trailing plant/liana/creeper/wild vine (Gynostemma pentaphyllum or Vitis pentaphylla)
damage egg so it does not hatch
great array of spears and chariots
